description:
Welcome to the land of road. The Synapse delivers equal parts endurance and performance. For a personal fitness goal or your first fondo, this sporty ride is nicely spec'd out. It's fun for short sprints, long rides, and everything in between. However you measure success, you'll finish any group ride or daily commute looking forward to the next one.

  • Smartform C2 alloy frame and carbon fork, with aggressive road bike geometry
  • SAVE™ Micro-suspension uses strategically engineered flex zones in the rear triangle to smooth out the ride
  • Women's specific features: women's saddle and slim-width handlebars
  • Promax Decoder R mechanical disc brakes offer plenty of stopping power
  • 2x9 drive train pairs 50-34T chain rings with an 11-34T cassette
  • Shimano Sora groupset with FSA Vero cranks
  • Vittoria Zaffiro tires are grippy and have low rolling resistance
  • Bikes are covered by MEC's Rocksolid Guarantee and Bike Service Agreement. You can bring your bike to any MEC bike shop for free adjustments and minor maintenance for 1 year after purchase
  • Due to challenges with supply chain, components may be substituted for comparable parts at any time. The listed build is how MEC intended your bike to arrive, though the manufacturer may need to make a tweak or two to get you riding sooner
name: Cannondale Synapse Al Sora Bicycle - Women's

specs.value: Cannondale Grip Bar Tape w/ gel
